items.title: Added: Free trial for premium subscriptions
Added: automatic backup of the latest opened database version
Added: "Exclude from iCloud/iTunes backup" option for local files
Added: Alternative app icons
Added: Japanese translation [thanks, Hiroto Sakai and miyar520]
Added: Possibility to preserve stored master keys on database timeout [thanks, Niklas]
Added: Detailed info about database location
Added: Info about the calling app in AutoFill [thanks, Markus]
Added: File Info dialog for key files in AutoFill
Improved: Default app icon
Improved: You can add database files with any extension [thanks, everyone]
Improved: Better handling of slow/unresponsive storage providers
Improved: More detailed load/save progress messages
Improved: More human-friendly error messages
Improved: Clarified that Universal Clipboard timeout on external devices is fixed at 2 minutes [thanks, Christian]
Improved: File Info dialog contents
Changed: By default, automatic backups are stored for 2 months instead of forever
Changed: AppLock setup reminder can be dismissed [thanks, Dan]
Changed: Updated translations [thanks, everyone]
Fixed: Occasional freezing and crashing on start
Fixed: Freezing while accessing remote files
Fixed: Freezing when there are many backup files [thanks, Paul]
Fixed: Excessive caching of file attributes, such as size and timestamps
Fixed: Crash when selecting "Enable AppLock" reminder with VoiceOver [thanks, Dickson]
Fixed: Crash when adding an entry attachment [thanks, Sophie]
Fixed: Crash on cold launch with an argument [thanks, Helmut]
Fixed: Crash when importing an already existing file [thanks, Marc]
Fixed: After transferring to a new device, AppLock did not always accept the correct passcode [thanks, Kirsten]
Fixed: Sporadic crash immediately after loading a database
Fixed: Return key behavior when changing DB master key
Fixed: Jumpy pull-to-refresh animation [thanks, Sebastian]
Fixed: Respect the "Search enabled" flag of .kdbx groups [thanks, David]
Fixed: Default properties of newly created Recycle Bin groups
Fixed: Added 15-second timeout to all file operations
Fixed: Handling database settings/stored keys when the target file is missing
Fixed: KDB root group appeared expired [thanks, Stefan]
Fixed: Refresh entry viewer after dismissing entry editor [thanks, Felix]
Fixed: Refresh search results after changing search settings [thanks, Paolo]
Fixed: Standard field names are excluded from search [thanks, Paolo]
Fixed: Missing credits for Yubico Mobile SDK and TPInAppReceipt library
Fixed: Localization of some screens
Fixed: Minor UI fixes here and there
Fixed: custom field changes sometimes were not saved [thanks, Michael]
Fixed: progress bar sometimes appeared misplaced [thanks, Michael]
Updated CZ/FR/SV localizations
Added: Support for YubiKey 5Ci
Added: App Lock setup is now part of initial onboarding [thanks, everyone]
Added: The notes field is expandable now
Added: New setting - whether to auto-unlock the last used database [thanks, Stanislav and Niklas]
Added: New settings - whether to search in field names and in protected values [thanks, Paolo]
Added: New setting - show protected fields (off by default) [thanks, Jerry & Jeffrey]
Added: New setting - use Universal Clipboard (off by default) [thanks, Daniel]
Added: After copying a field, you can also quickly share it to other apps
Added: Entries marked as non-autofillable in KeePassXC won't appear in AutoFill [thanks, Igor]
Added: File Export/Delete operations in the File Info dialog [thanks, Dirk]
Added: Detailed loading progress messages for .kdbx databases
Changed: Improved loading of MiniKeePass databases
Changed: Better accessibility - respect the "bold text" system setting
Changed: Support email template now includes device type (iPhone/iPad)
Changed: Updated translations
Fixed: With extra-large font, group names appeared trimmed by height
Fixed: Biometric auth asked for a premium upgrade under a heavy use [thanks, Theo]
Fixed: Parsing of misformatted timestamps sometimes produced by MiniKeePass [thanks, everyone]
Fixed: Import conflict resolution dialog did not appear for key files
Fixed: Groups and entries always appeared as non-expiring in v1 databases [thanks, Stefan]
Fixed: Database file descriptions were shown in the system in wrong language [thanks, majijiwi]
Fixed: Load entries with missing field values, treat them as empty [thanks, Oliver]
Fixed: Support Steam TOTP configured in KeePassXC with the "encoder" parameter [thanks, Manan]
Fixed: Minor UI fixes here and there
Added: When importing a database, the app will ask whether to overwrite the existing file [thanks, everyone]
Added: New setting - whether AutoFill should auto-proceed when there is only one suitable entry [thanks, Nicolai]
Added: French translation [thanks, Steph31700 and Robin Chamberlin]
Added: Italian translation [thanks, iWally and spaccapirlin]
Changed: When you delete a file, it is deleted permanently instead of moving to trash (sometimes trashing failed silently)
Fixed: Auto-unlock the last used database also on iPads (if allowed by settings) [thanks, everyone]
Fixed: It was impossible to edit/move Recycle Bin group in .kdbx databases [thanks, Amnuay]
Fixed: Sometimes it was not possible to select databases from Google Drive [thanks, K.B.]
Fixed: Always treat password fields as protected [thanks, Robin]
Fixed: Adding databases with mixed-case extensions [thanks, Thorsten]
Fixed: Changed master key was not remembered when it should have been
Fixed: Merging of databases with moved groups/entries [thanks, Daniel]
Fixed: Infinite Clipboard Timeout was treated as immediate [thanks, Andreas]
Fixed: Merging of databases with changed master key
Fixed: Sometimes it was impossible to delete files
Fixed: Backup files should not count towards free DB limit
Fixed: Colored asterisks after re-hiding passwords
Fixed: Minor localization fixes
Added: YubiKey support (Compatible with KeePassXC, NFC keys, iOS 13+)
Added: Move/copy groups and entries to other groups
Added: Long-press menu for files, groups and entries
Added: Highlight digits and special symbols in stored passwords [thanks, Sean]
Added: Support for Steam TOTP with GAuth URI format [thanks, Nu11u5]
Added: Support for TOTP based on SHA-256 and SHA-512 [thanks, Walter]
Added: "Add Key File" button to key file pickers [thanks, Ron]
Improved: Preserve the entered master password after DB unlock errors [thanks, Bertrand]
Fixed: Occassional freezing at "Loading... 0%" [thanks, everyone]
Fixed: occasional freezing when accessing local files on iOS 13
Fixed: AutoFill FaceID loop on iOS 13.1.3 [thanks, Quinn]
Fixed: Add missing symbols to the password generator [thanks, Justen]
Fixed: "Failed to open file" error after creating a new database [thanks, Craig]
Fixed: Loading MiniKeePass DBs with minor issues [thanks, everyone]
Fixed: Overly wide popovers on iPadOS 13
Improved: Unlock button be gone! Auto-unlock databases whenever possible.
Improved: AutoFill will automatically select the only entry [thanks, Igor]
Improved: added a confirmation dialog when locking database manually [thanks, Tim]
Fixed: AutoFill stuck in FaceID loop on iOS 13.2.3 [thanks, everyone]
Fixed: Improved handling of databases that close slowly
Fixed: Sometimes entries incorrectly appeared as expired [thanks, Felix]
Fixed: Double unlock screen after database creation [thanks, magebarf]
Fixed: Repetitive Welcome screen after clearing backup files [thanks, Chris]
Other minor refinements and fixes
Fixed: AppLock did not always work on iOS 13.2 [thanks, loblawbob]
Fixed: With passcode-only AppLock, database list flashed visible on launch [thanks, Joseph]
Added: haptic feedback for some UI actions
Changed: Won't force-erase the master key from keychain on database errors [thanks, Silunare]
Refined: compatibility with other installed KeePass apps [thanks, Philippe]
Fixed: when deleting a database, the key file association is now also removed [thanks, M.H.]
Fixed: premium features missing in Pro version's AutoFill [thanks, J.B.]
Added: Spanish translation
Changed: Default Database Timeout is now Never instead of 1 hour
Improved: support of larger font sizes
Other bug fixes and improvements
Added: KeePassium Pro edition, compatible with Family Sharing
Fixed: On iPadOS 13, the app showed an empty screen
Fixed: Search bar did not autofocus in AutoFill (iOS 13) [thanks, tunger]
Fixed: Premium Upgrade screen was not available to premium users
Fixed: Database timeout could have been set to 'Never' in free version
Refined: colors in the Premium Upgrade screen
Added: Swedish translation [thanks, Patrik Thunström]
Added: Czech translation [thanks, Tomáš Piešťanský, Marcel Piestansky, and Radek Weis]
Refined: If current database is inaccessible due to new iOS 13 permissions, the app will suggest to re-add the database [thanks, Patrik]
Fixed: Database unlock errors were not always shown
Fixed: VoiceOver will automatically announce database unlocking errors
Fixed: Deleted entries are now excluded from username suggestions
Fixed: AppLock passcode colors in dark mode [thanks, Joseph and Chris]
Fixed: Dismissing the AppLock setup dialog with a gesture (iOS 13)
Added: iOS 13 dark mode
Added: In entry editor, you can quickly pick a random or a frequently used username [thanks, Mike]
Added: German translation [thanks, Lukas Wolfsteiner and @cpktmpkt]
Added: Dutch translation [thanks, Heimen Stoffels]
Added: Chinese Simplified and Traditional translations [thanks, 3374575857]
Added: Russian translation
Changed: Expired items now shown in strikethrough font and with original icons
Changed: New entries are pre-filled with a default user name from database settings (if any) [thanks, Mike]
Changed: Added a "Repeat password" field to the Change Master Key dialog [thanks, A.G.]
Refined: Accessibility of the entry Notes field [thanks, Adrian]
Fixed: Search controller did not show up on iOS 13
Fixed: Entry timestamps were not visible on iOS 13
Fixed: Dismissing dialogs with a gesture on iOS 13
Fixed: Premium upgrade did not work on iOS 13
Fixed: Custom fields could interfere with the fixed ones [thanks, Michael]
Minor UI fixes and improvements [thanks, S.Y., KK9 and raymond127]
Added: In-app announcements about the AppStore release and early-bird promo
Added: Associated the app with keepassium.com domain, to allow auto-filling master passwords from Keychain
Added: Detection whether running in TestFlight (beta) or App Store (production) environment
Refined: Added app version to About screen and diagnostic log [thanks, Marcel]
Refined: AutoFill now also searches for full URL in custom fields [thanks, Dragonblitz10]
Refined: Hiding visible passwords when leaving the app [thanks, V.M.]
Refined: Running in TestFlight automatically enables premium features
Refined: Switched to prettier version numbering: major.minor.build
Fixed: Incomplete loading of AutoType sequences [thanks, Silun]
Fixed: Fixed broken App Store links [thanks, Patrik]
Fixed: Don't show usage stats in premium version (they are frozen anyway)
Fixed: Entry sorting in AutoFill [thanks, rderensy]
Fixed: AutoFill did not understand domain-name only URLs [thanks, Brett]
Fixed: Accessibility labels in entry editor and for Add Database buttons [thanks, Adrian]
Fixed: Creating a new database also created an empty backup file [thanks, Phani]
Fixed: Jumpy/squished footer in Settings [thanks, Patrik]
Refined: Extended TOTP support
Refined: Improved VoiceOver accessibility
A few minor bug fixes and improvements
Added: Switching between multiple databases
Added: Unlimited database timeout
Added: In-app attachment preview
Added: Biometric app protection
Added: Password AutoFill (iOS 12+)
Added: Composite master keys
Added: Loading and saving kdb/kdbx3/kdbx4 files
Added: Argon2, AES, ChaCha20, Salsa20, Twofish algorithms
Added: View TOTP (time-based one-time passwords) created by KeePassXC (RFC6238 and Steam TOTP)
Added: Preserving database master key in keychain
Added: App, database and clipboard timeout
